text: On July 17, 2022, a mass shooting took place at the Greenwood Park Mall in Greenwood, Indiana, United States. The shooting happened at 5:56 pm EDT (UTCâˆ’04:00). Three people were killed and two others were injured in the shooting. The shooter, Jonathan Sapirman, was shot to death by Elisjsha Dicken, a civilian who also had a gun. ==References== Category:2022 mass shootings in the United States Category:2022 murders in the United States Category:2020s in Indiana Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2022 Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the United States Category:Attacks on shops Category:July 2022 events
title: Greenwood Park Mall shooting
